d345054b-b1be-4fc5-ac7f-378309924caa.name: tkopton_Cluster_Remove_Hosts_Count_CPU
d345054b-b1be-4fc5-ac7f-378309924caa.description: Displays how many hosts can be removed from the cluster following the demand model and the recommended total size - CPU.

89195be7-8f32-4187-8963-27e7c2cbb708.name: tkopton_Cluster_Remove_Hosts_Count_Combined_Min
89195be7-8f32-4187-8963-27e7c2cbb708.description: Displays how many hosts can be removed from the cluster following the demand model and the recommended total size - Min of CPU and Mem based recommendadtions.

bdeb860f-3d9c-4afa-a014-abc9451dced0.name: tkopton_Cluster_Remove_Hosts_Count_Mem
bdeb860f-3d9c-4afa-a014-abc9451dced0.description: Displays how many hosts can be removed from the cluster following the demand model and the recommended total size - CPU.

a43ce4bb-7596-4b42-a8b9-831222580ba8.name: tkopton_CPU_Usable_Factor
a43ce4bb-7596-4b42-a8b9-831222580ba8.description: Factor reflecting the usable capacity. E.g. 0.85 means 85% of total is usable after HA and Buffers.

fc98ee65-749e-41e6-9b05-11d89ec2d3a0.name: tkopton_Mem_Usable_Factor
fc98ee65-749e-41e6-9b05-11d89ec2d3a0.description: Factor reflecting the usable capacity. E.g. 0.85 means 85% of total is usable after HA and Buffers.
